attributes.additional_details:
Disabled blue badge abuse has become so bad that now every Tom,Dick or Harry have one whether disabled or not.
I'm asking you to sign this E-Petition to try to get changes made on how blue badges are given out as recently the criteria seems now to include if your a fat slob or just elderly.
I would like to see more checks made to see if they truly do need this type of help as being fat or elderly is not a disability.
I would also like to see blue badges linked to the blue badge owners car/or their carers as its very common practise for Granny to get a blue badge and its then passed all around her family for all to use and abuse
